items.sentence: Tom didn\'t know the reason why Mary was crying.
Tom didn\'t know whether he should laugh or cry.
Tom didn\'t know who Mary was planning to marry.
Tom will never believe that I did it on purpose.
I tried to convince Tom to go to Boston with me.
I understand that Tom is leaving Boston tonight.
I used to be scared of spiders, but not anymore.
I used to go swimming with Tom almost every day.
I used to walk everywhere when I was a teenager.
Do you think we can do this without Tom\'s help?
Do you want me to tell Tom that we won\'t do it?
I find it very difficult to pronounce that word.
I forgot to do something that needed to be done.
I forgot to tell Tom what he was supposed to do.
I forgot to turn off the TV before going to bed.
I found a dead cockroach on the kitchen counter.
Tom was telling the truth about you, wasn\'t he?
Tom said he would\'ve done that if he could\'ve.
The police suspected that Tom was a drug dealer.
The police think that Mary poisoned her husband.
